original_text: And if thy brother be waxen poor, and fallen in decay with thee; then thou shalt relieve him: yea, though he be a stranger, or a sojourner; that he may live with thee.
korean_text: 네 형제가 가난하게 되어 빈 손으로 네 곁에 있거든 너는 그를 도와 거류민이나 동거인처럼 너와 함께 생활하게 하되

sentences.original_text: And if thy brother be waxen poor
and fallen in decay with thee
yea, though he be a stranger
that he may live with thee
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 너와 함께 살 수 있도록
